articles.author: Lorne Cook, Sam McNeil, Angela Charlton
articles.title: EU leaders work into the night to ease Belgian fears of Russian retaliation over a loan to Ukraine - AP News
articles.description: European Union leaders have stalled in talks about providing a massive loan to Ukraine using frozen Russian assets. Belgium seeks guarantees to protect itself from Russian retaliation. The plan involves using Russian assets for a "reparation loan" to support …
articles.content: BRUSSELS (AP) European Union leaders stalled early Friday in talks to provide a massive loan to Ukraine using frozen Russian assets, officials said, as Belgium sought ironclad guarantees from its par… [+5815 chars]
